mapper.insert: insert into bbs(id, ref, step, depth, title, content, wdate, del, readcount) values(#{id}, (select ifnull(max(ref), 0)+1 from bbs b), 0, 0, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, 0)
mapper.update: update bbs set step=step+1 where ref=(select ref from (select ref from bbs a where seq=#{seq}) A) and step>(select step from (select step from bbs b where seq=#{seq}) B)
